metadata.title: CVE-2019-16993 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In phpBB before 3.1.7-PL1, includes/acp/acp_bbcodes.php has improperverification of a CSRF token on the BBCode page in the AdministrationControl Panel. An actual CSRF attack is possible if an attacker alsomanages to retrieve the session id of a reauthenticated administrator priorto targeting them.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16993` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpbb3 - 3.0.12-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
phpbb3-l10n - 3.0.12-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: phpbb3 package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.0.12-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
